title: Chennai Super Kings vs Sunrisers Hyderabad Highlights, IPL 2025: CSK On Brink Of Elimination After 5-Wicket Loss To SRH
description: Chennai Super Kings vs Sunrisers Hyderabad Highlights, IPL 2025: CSK are all but out of the edition after losing to SRH by 5 wickets in their IPL 2025 match.
excerpt: Chennai Super Kings vs Sunrisers Hyderabad Highlights, IPL 2025: CSK are all but out of the edition after losing to SRH by 5 wickets in their IPL 2025 match.
text: CSK vs SRH Highlights, IPL 2025© BCCI Chennai Super Kings vs Sunrisers Hyderabad Highlights, IPL 2025: CSK are all but out of the edition after losing to SRH by 5 wickets in their IPL 2025 match at MA Chidambaram Stadium, Chennai on Friday. Harshal Patel bagged a four-wicket haul as SRH bundled out CSK for 154 after opting to bowl first. Dewald Brevis top-scored for CSK with a 25-ball 42, while Ayush Mhatre continued his impressive start to IPL with another cameo at the top. He hit 30 off 18 balls. SRH stumbled in the chase but an unbeaten 49-run stand between Kamindu Mendis and Nitish Reddy eventually sealed the game for them. A loss for CSK meant that they stayed at the bottom spot in the points table with just two wins in nine matches. The MS Dhoni-led side has lost seven matches and stands on the brink of elimination. html:
CSK vs SRH Highlights, IPL 2025© BCCI

Chennai Super Kings vs Sunrisers Hyderabad Highlights, IPL 2025: CSK are all but out of the edition after losing to SRH by 5 wickets in their IPL 2025 match at MA Chidambaram Stadium, Chennai on Friday. Harshal Patel bagged a four-wicket haul as SRH bundled out CSK for 154 after opting to bowl first. Dewald Brevis top-scored for CSK with a 25-ball 42, while Ayush Mhatre continued his impressive start to IPL with another cameo at the top. He hit 30 off 18 balls. SRH stumbled in the chase but an unbeaten 49-run stand between Kamindu Mendis and Nitish Reddy eventually sealed the game for them. A loss for CSK meant that they stayed at the bottom spot in the points table with just two wins in nine matches. The MS Dhoni-led side has lost seven matches and stands on the brink of elimination. (Scorecard) | (IPL 2025 Playoffs Scenario)

Chennai Super Kings vs Sunrisers Hyderabad Highlights -

Get alerts for live updates

Turn on notifications to receive alerts as stories develop in real-time. You can manage alerts in your app's settings.

  • April25202523:17 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Sunrisers Hyderabad win!

    Sunrisers Hyderabad win have won the game by a five-wicket margin. They stumbled in the middle but a 49-run stand between Kamindu Mendis and Nitish Reddy has sealed the victory for them. On the other hand, Chennai Super Kings are on the brink of elimination.

  • April25202523:12 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Formality remains!

    Seven runs came off the Khaleel Ahmed over. It was smart play from Nitish Reddy and Kamindu[ Mendis as they relied on singles and doubles in the over and didn't take any risk. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 6 runs in 12 balls. Unless they do any blunder, mere formality remains in this game.

    SRH 149/5 (18)

  • April25202523:12 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Formality remains!

    Seven runs came off the Khaleel Ahmed over. It was smart play from Nitish Reddy and Kamindu[ Mendis as they relied on singles and doubles in the over and didn't take any risk. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 6 runs in 12 balls.

    SRH 149/5 (18)

  • April25202523:07 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Pathirana goes expensive!

    15 runs came off the third over from Matheesha Pathirana and Chennai Super Kings have nearly lost this game. Sunrisers Hyderabad are on the brink of victory. They need 13 runs in 18 balls. Khaleel Ahmed is set to bowl the next over. Here we go.

    SRH 142/5 (17)

  • April25202523:03 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: FOUR!

    A good shot from Nitish Reddy. He went on the leg side to create room and slammed the Pathirana delivery through the deep mid-wicket for a four. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 20 runs in 21 balls. This is their match to lose it seems!

    SRH 135/5 (16.3)

  • April25202523:01 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Expensive over!

    This is not what was expected from Noor Ahmad in his final over. He conceded 13 runs in it. The over had two no-balls that came through over-stepping. Poor from Noor. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 28 runs in 24 balls.

  • April25202522:58 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: FOUR!

    That was a well-timed sweep shot from Kamindu Mendis. He hit it through the deep square leg. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 33 runs in 26 balls.

  • April25202522:55 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: 8-run over!

    Matheesha Pathirana has conceded eight runs in his second over. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 41 runs in 30 balls. Noor Ahmad will bowl his final over. Can he provide CSK some more wickets? If he manages to do it, it would be the match for CSK!

    SRH 114/5 (15)

  • April25202522:45 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: OUT!

    Another wicket goes down! Noor Ahmad has dismissed Aniket Verma and Sunrisers Hyderabad are in all sorts of trouble now. It was tossed up by Noor Ahmad and Aniket tried to play a slog-sweep on it. He ended up getting a top-edge and Deepak Hooda took the catch at long-on. SRH need 49 runs in 37 balls.

  • April25202522:43 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Good start from Pathirana!

    Matheesha Pathirana was brought into the attack and he conceded only four runs in his first over despite bowling a couple of wides. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 61 runs in 42 balls.

    SRH 94/4 (13)

  • April25202522:36 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: OUT!

    Ishan Kishan is OUT! He hit it so well but found the fielder at deep mid-wicket. It was a short ball from Noor Ahmad and Kishan pulled it on the leg side. Sam Curran, who was stationed at deep, took a good catch jumping behind. Kishan departs for 44 off 34.

    SRH 90/4 (12)

  • April25202522:27 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: End of 10 overs!

    It was an expensive over from Sam Curran. 14 runs came off it. However, Chennai Super Kings are still going really well in the second innings. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 86 runs in 60 balls. The asking rate for them is 8.6 which is not a cakewalk for sure. 

    SRH 69/3 (10)

  • April25202522:24 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: FOUR!

    A fuller ball from Sam Curran and Ishan Kishan slams it over the in-field for a four. That was a lofted drive over the extra-cover for a four. The southpaw is looking good tonight. He should take his innings deep. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 95 runs in 64 balls.

    SRH 60/3 (9.2)

  • April25202522:17 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: OUT!

    Heinrich Klaasen is OUT! SRH's reliable and certainly the most adaptive batter goes back to the dugout for 7 off 8 balls. It was tossed up from Ravindra Jadeja and Klaasen tried to go for a big one but ended up hitting it high in the air. Deepak Hooda came under it around long-on and took the catch quite comfortably. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 101 runs in 71 balls.

  • April25202522:13 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Good start from Jadeja!

    Ravindra Jadeja was brought into the attack and he bowled an economical over. Only five singles came off it. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 113 runs in 78 balls. They need a good partnership from Heinrich Klaasen and Ishan Kishan here.

    SRH 42/2 (7)

  • April25202522:09 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: End of powerplay!

    Sunrisers Hyderabad have lost two wickets and scored 37 runs in the first powerplay. This phase was completely dominated by Chennai Super Kings. SRH need 118 runs in 84 balls. This surface is still difficult for batters.

    SRH 37/2 (6)

  • April25202522:08 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: WICKET!

    5.3 - Massive blow for Sunrisers Hyderabad. They have lost the wicket of Travis Head. Anshul Kamboj has got the wicket. It was a back of a length delivery from Kamboj and that clipped the off-bail of the stumps.

  • April25202522:03 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Economical over!

    Spin was introduced and Noor Ahmad was the one who started it. He conceded just 7 runs in hte over. Chennai Super Kings bowlers have done a fine job so far. They have picked just one wicket but have made sure that SRH don't score quick runs.

    SRH 36/1 (5)

  • April25202522:01 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Noor Ahmad in pain!

    Noor Ahmad  has hurt himself while trying to stop a shot from Ishan Kishan. He tried to stop the ball on the follow-up as Kishan slammed the ball hard down the ground. Noor is in pain as his finger of the left hand is currently being checked by the physio. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 123 runs in 93 balls.

    SRH 32/1 (4.3)

  • April25202521:53 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: FOUR! FOUR!

    Ishan Kishan slammed two fours to Khaleel Ahmed in the over that fetched SRH a total of 8 runs. Sunrisers Hyderabad need 134 runs in 102 balls. Anshul Kamboj will continue to bowl from the other end. Here we go.

    SRH 21/1 (3)

  • April25202521:48 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Economical over!

    Anshul Kamboj came in to bowl the second over and conceded only seven runs in it. This was an economical over from the right-arm pacer.

    SRH 13/1 (2)

  • April25202521:45 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Good over!

    That was a good first over from Khaleel Ahmed. Only six runs and a wicket came off it. Travis Head smashed the fifth ball of the over for a four. He slashed hard and got a top-edge that flew through the slip region for a four.

    SRH 6/1 (1)

  • April25202521:42 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: OUT!

    Abhishek Sharma is out for a two-ball duck. He has played that good length delivery into the hands of the fielder at cover. This is a big wicket for Chennai Super Kings and they are off to a really good start in the chase of 155.

  • April25202521:38 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: The chase begins!

    Khaleel Ahmed starts with a short ball to Abhishek Sharma in SRH's chase of 155 vs CSK.

  • April25202521:25 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: CSK all out for 154!

    Unadkat caps off CSK's innings with a wicket. Harshal with a four-fer and CSK are all out for 154. SRH will be happy with that score. With dew coming in, it will be difficult to defend that. 

  • April25202521:18 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Good shot!

    Hooda gets across and scoops it for four. The ball was on the fuller side, and wide of off. 150 up for CSK with this

    CSK: 151/9 (19.2)

  • April25202521:13 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: WICKET!

    Top edge pouched at short third! Harshal gets his fourth. Noor went swiping at it across the line, and ended up getting a little top edge behind the wicket. Easy catch for Shami

    Noor Ahmad c Mohammed Shami b Patel 2 (3)

    CSK: 137/9 (18.1)

  • April25202521:05 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: WICKET!

    Edged and taken! Cummmins gets his second and CSK are rocked. Even 150 seems impossible from here. Wild swin by Kamboj. Thick edge pouched by Klaasen

    Anshul Kamboj c Klaasen b Cummins 2 (4)

    CSK: 134/8 (17.3)

  • April25202521:01 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Dhoni is gone!

    Dhoni hits it straight to point! Harshal gets his third and CSK are now in deep trouble. Dhoni ended up chipping it straight to Abhishek to send the Chepauk back to silence

    MS Dhoni c Abhishek Sharma b Patel 6 (10)

    CSK: 131/7 (16.3)

  • April25202520:56 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Dhoni in the middle!

    Just six off his first eight balls for MSD! How far can he drag CSK in the last four overs? CSK will hope their talisman could bat at least half of the remaining 24 deliveries. But, it's time for a commercial break first

    CSK: 130/6 (16)

  • April25202520:46 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Unadkat strikes!

    Takes off pace and Dube holes out! He didn't middle the ball, though, and only sent it right into the fielder's lap. Well held at long-on

    Shivam Dube c Abhishek Sharma b Unadkat 12 (9)

    CSK: 118/6 (13.5)

  • April25202520:41 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: What a catch!

    What have you done, Mendis? Crowd in stunned silence as Mendis pulls off a stunner to end Brevis's dangerous cameo. "Which is his weak side we never know": This statement from Ian Bishop sums up Mendis' effort

    Dewald Brevis c Mendis b Patel 42 (25)

    CSK: 114/5 (12.5)

  • April25202520:36 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: 6,6,6!

    Brevis breaks the shackles! 3 maximums in six balls. What an over for the young South African and CSK. Shades of AB de Villiers. Takes down Mendis

    CSK: 107/4 (12)

  • April25202520:30 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Dube finds the gap!

    Beats mid-off and extra cover! Full toss, drilled into the gap. Driven with nice timing. No chance for the diving mid-off

    CSK: 83/4 (10.5)

  • April25202520:26 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: WICKET!

    Bowled him! It kept low and Jadeja gets beaten by the pace as well. Jadeja sees his middle stump knocked back. Mendis breaks the stand

    Ravindra Jadeja b Mendis 21 (17)

    CSK: 74/4 (9.3)

  • April25202520:20 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Umpire calls for Strategic Timeout!

    73/3 off the first nine! 21 off 16 for Jadeja while Brevis has been cautious during his 9-ball 12. Zeeshan Ansari has bowled well but has gone wicketless. A bit harsh i would say. But, SRH won't mind this total

  • April25202520:14 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Dropped!

    Fumbled at long-off! Harshal drops a sitter and Zeeshan is not happy. Jadeja tried to take this one but it came off the toe end. Harshal had plenty of time but he fumbles

    CSK: 58/3 (6.6)

  • April25202520:05 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: Cummins with the breakthrough!

    Cummins with the big wicket! Mhatre was batting so well but mistimes this time. Looks to go down the ground but ends up chipping it straight down to mid off. Easy catch for Ishan Kishan 

    Ayush Mhatre c Ishan Kishan b Cummins 30 (19)

    CSK: 47/3 (5,3)

  • April25202519:59 (IST)

    CSK vs SRH Live: WICKET!

    Curran holes out! Curran looks to pull but Harshal cramps him for room. Picks out the deep midwicket fielder

    Sam Curran c Verma b Patel 9 (10)

    CSK: 41/2 (4.3)

Topics mentioned in this article
